title: Gong.io's Bendov on Pioneering Intelligence Sales Tool (Audio)
itunes:title: Gong.io's Bendov on Pioneering Intelligence Sales Tool (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Amit Bendov, CEO and Co-Founder Gong.io, will discuss his new sales intelligence tool, the evolution of artificial intelligence, and how different industries are using it.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
